name: Queer corporation
description: The engravings were made with naive and simple idea in mind, that they would stay forever. That not even the passing of time could come to outvalue its greatness,  it would be placed before other humans to see. Once skin to skin, now name to name, unbroken historical link. That would render its own value upon us, promoting the great importance that once betook immaterial form; the word and bond.
